amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 119-167 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, 12, 16, 17, 18, 20, 22, 23, 24, 26, 27, 29, and 30.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter (TX) amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Carter (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter (TX) amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
